attributes.action: Government to order banks to skip mortgages for a month, Coronavirus outbreak
attributes.additional_details: As corona virus caused an economic damage for all taxpayers and business owners including self employed. This will cause struggling situations for everyone to pay the bills
attributes.background:
Hi,

It would be useful if all banks skips mortgage for a month at least. Moving forward council tax and energy bills should be considered for the same.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
